name: underscore.json
description: Underscore.json is a json library written in javascript that can apply jQuery style selectors to access JSON objects. It can be used on server-side environment such as nodejs, as well as the browser, and extends jquery if it finds it as well. What's more, just like $ in jQuery, underscore.json envourages self-referencing style chaining of calls.
author: Bhasker Kode <bosky101@gmail.com> (http://about.me/kode)
